amendment.description: Amendment restores the application of antitrust laws to the business of health insurance by amending the McCarran-Ferguson Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-416 to restore the application of antitrust laws to the business of health insurance by amending the McCarran-Ferguson Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Gosar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
